title: Artificial Intelligence Utilization in Higher Education: Adaptive Support Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and experience with Learning Management Systems (LMS)
context.additional_context: Flexible online AI-driven adaptive learning support system for working professionals (medical, legal, technical) balancing employment and study.

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose individual learning gaps and select personalized learning materials using an AI-based recommendation system
Learners can improve conceptual understanding to over 80% by receiving real-time feedback through an adaptive quiz system
Learners can develop collaborative learning strategies with peer groups using AI analytics tools within the LMS
Learners can apply improvement cycles three or more times by receiving detailed formative assessments for submitted assignments through an AI evaluation model
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
